articles.title: One Of Ferrari's Best Mid-Engine V8 Supercars Costs The Same As A New Corvette Z06
articles.description: The base price of a 2025 Chevrolet Corvette Z06 is also enough to buy one of Ferrari's best berlinettas, powered by a naturally aspirated V8 engine.

articles.title: Instagram’s Testing an In-App Teleprompter Feature for Edits
articles.description: On-screen script prompts could make for more appealing video clips.

articles.title: ‘Not available in your region’: what is a VPN and how can I use one safely?
articles.description: VPNs are becoming a popular option for people wanting to access overseas content. But they’re much more than that – and sometimes legally murky.

articles.title: Windsurf says Anthropic is limiting its direct access to Claude AI models
articles.description: The CEO of Windsurf, a popular AI-assisted coding tool, said Anthropic is limiting its direct access to certain AI models.

articles.title: Google's Latest App Lets Your Phone Run AI in Your Pocket-Entirely Offline
articles.description: Google has quietly launched AI Edge Gallery, a new Android app that runs large language models like Gemma entirely offline.

articles.title: Refurbished Tech Is Always an Option for You, and It Could Be a 'Joyful' One, Too
articles.description: Joining the "joyful revolution" happening in the refurbished tech space is good for the planet, and good for dodging the tariffs, too.

articles.title: Meet the Next Chapter of Ultra
articles.description: For years, Samsung has listened to users asking for bigger screens, better cameras and new ways to connect and create.
